title: As debt returns dwindle, Avendus Finance explains why private credit funds work - Economic Times
content: As debt returns dwindle, Avendus Finance explains why private credit funds work  Economic Times
description: In an interview to ETMarkets.com, Nilesh Dhedhi, Head of Structured Credit, Avendus Finance, charts out how the NBFC crisis following the collapse of IL&Fs and then the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic drove the shift to private credit.
